review.title: Just avg
review.reviewText: Average hotel, nothing great, small room, very limited parking.

review.title: Very limited parking
review.reviewText: Small spaces and limited parking, first come first served. Otherwise take your chances on the street.

review.title: Just what we wanted
review.reviewText:
This hotel was perfect for us. It was reasonably price and the location was good for us. It had off street parking so once we got there we walked, used a taxi, or a tour bus. The staff was helpful and suggested many things to do to make out trip better!
It was not a fancy hotel with amenities but we came to San Francisco to see the city not hang out in our hotel room!!

managementResponses.response: Dear guest, we were pleased to see that you loved the location and easy access to major attractions as well bars and restaurants. This area is highly desirable for travelers. We were a bit disappointed to see that you felt that our hotel is only ideal for a short stay. We always strive to provide a clean, comfortable stay with a top notch service for our guests. And guests generally love the comfortable bed, our amenities and overall cleanliness. Please know that we will look into your experience and make improvements. But we sincerely hope you'll give us another opportunity to restore your confidence in our hotel. Thanks again for your feedback.

review.title: Motel - it's what u pay for in SF money
review.reviewText: You get an OK bed if you just care to spend a night. Otherwise the place could use some upgrades.
review.locationRemarks: Close by the hop on and off bus tour stop and near some nice bars and restaurants in the area. Good location if you want to stay near downtown.

managementResponses.response: Michael, It is good to hear from a returning guest. We are really pleased that you had a wonderful stay with us. We're happy to be an affordable rate for travelers visiting San Francisco who need a clean, comfortable place with a great location. We hope that our great rates, service and amenities will keeps us on your radar for your next visit. Thank you for staying with us and for your wonderful review.

review.title: Second time at this hotel, even better this time
review.reviewText: My husband and I stayed here in 2012 and thought the room was clean and basic but that's what we were expecting. We loved the proximity to the marina and the fact that it has free wifi, mini fridge, and free parking. This time was even better (2016). We got an updated room with nice laminate flooring and stone countertops, also we had a nice street view of Lombard and was able to open the window for the breeze and background city noise (if ur into that). They offer free breakfast and the little patio is nice to sit on while having coffee with a nice city and water view. It's no Ritz but I love this little hotel..ESPECIALLY for the price, that's why we came back again. üëçüèº

managementResponses.response: HI Steve, we are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel to be of a great value. We aim to provide a quality stay at a great price, so we are glad that we achieved our goal on your visit. Once again, thank you for taking time to write us your review, we hope to see you soon again!

review.title: Perfectly fine 2 star hotel in San Fran
review.reviewText: If you need to stay in San Fransisco on a budget then this place is perfectly fine. Don't expect too many frills, this is 2 star hotel for sure. However the rooms are clean and the facility kept in good order. The staff were very nice and helpful. Breakfast is a bit of joke, don't rely on it if you have a long day of walking to do around the city.
review.locationRemarks: Cow Hollow has plenty of shops and restaurants, plenty to do within walking distance.

managementResponses.response: Danielle, thank you so much for your stellar review! We're happy your stay with us was pleasant from room to location. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that benefit. Once again, thank you so much for your wonderful comments, we're looking forward to your next stay with us.

review.title: Nice M/Hotel steps away from the Presidio
review.reviewText: Room was exceptionally clean! Steps away from Presidio and Marina. One block down on Chestnut St are all the restaurants and delis so you can dine to fit your budget. If you're willing to climb the hills of Frisco, you're a 25 min walk to the Painted Ladies and the tour bus stops. 10 min in the car will take you to the Wharf all from a Motel on famed Lombard St. Oh and we are breakfast outside everyday!

managementResponses.response: We're pleased that you enjoyed your stay. There's nothing better than knowing that you've found a safe, clean, and comfortable place to stay after a long flight. That's one less worry on your plate during your travel! Thanks for choosing us. If you're ever in the area again, you're welcome to stay with us!

review.reviewText: Cheap tickets available for Airport Shuttle (we called the hotel upon arrival at airport, and they told us where to find the correct Shuttle).  Hotel location was convenient to where my daughter and I wanted to be.  Front office staff was  friendly and helped carry our luggage upstairs.  They also kept it stored on our check-out day until it was time to take the Shuttle back to the airport in the evening.
review.positiveRemarks: Pretty inner courtyard offered private place to unload baggage.
review.negativeRemarks: Add elevator to get to 2nd floor.
review.locationRemarks: Not much in the immediate block or two vicinity, but the marina is not far.

managementResponses.response: Hi there, there seems to be a confusion here. We haven't had a elevator down at all recently, also we do not have a patio. Furthermore, there is no parking in the hotel, the valet parking or self parking is available next to the hotel.

review.reviewText:
No elevator, when your tired from a long day of traveling the last thing you want to do is lug 3-50lbs bags up 2 flights of stairs.
T.V. did not work, they came up 2 days later to fix, but within 24 hours it quit working again.
room was dirty.food or some other substance smeared on the walls. they only gave 1 bath towel, and the towel were worn and torn, and when you want to have a shower at night and 1 in the morning you had to track down
housekeeping in the morning to get another towel. Patio was filthy and unusable. They deleted are access cards before our stay was over. Breakfast, what little they did offer had no place to sit down and eat it, you had to haul 
it to your room. The free parking is limited to ask few spots, and usually none available if you are not back by 6:00pm, then you get to try to find an place to park, good luck with 
that.
This would be able fine overnight hotel for under $75.00 dollars. Not worth going for a long term stay like we had, and paid over $100.00 and night.

managementResponses.response: We really want our customers to have a wonderful stay with us, if they do not, then we are disappointed as well. We are located in highly desirable area with many restaurants and places close by, but we do not usually hear complaints about the noise, I am sorry that this was the case during your visit. We hope you'll give us another try.

review.title: avoid it
review.reviewText: Noisy rooms, dirty; fixtures in the bathroom not functioning properly
review.locationRemarks: located on noisy street, good location, but street is filthy

managementResponses.response: Hi Bob, so sorry about the shower issue, we really want our guests to love their stay, we wish you'd brought this to our attention, we would have sent some one to fix the shower or give you another room to ensure you had a wonderful stay with us. We hope to welcome you back again soon. Thank you, Bob.

review.title: You get what you pay for, it worked for the night!
review.reviewText: It's a little out dated, but the price was right, free parking, free wifi . So the room wasn't bad , I thought alright not bad for $99.00 in till morning when I went to take a shower. You guessed it the shower doesn't work. The bath tub did. No thanks.

managementResponses.response: Thank you Hugo, hope you enjoyed neighborhood clubs, bars and restaurants. We can't wait to welcome you back again soon. Thanks again.

review.title: It nice close to clubs ,bars and restaurants !
review.reviewText: I recommend they have parking internet they nice too I definitely stay there again !!!

managementResponses.response: Thank you, Emma! We're thrilled to hear that you loved all aspects of your stay with us. We hope you'll stay with us again next time you visit the area. Thanks again.

review.title: Cheap room
review.reviewText: Room was clean and tidy, what you would expect for a budget hotel. Staff were happy to help when toilet was blocked, plunger was stored under the sink in bathroom. All in all a good place to stay for a few nights.

managementResponses.response: We are located in highly desirable area; however, we do provide complimentary parking for guests as first come first serve basis. If you need a help parking in our parking lot, please know that we are always willing to help. Thank you.

review.title: Parking
review.reviewText: Very limited and small parking space. Lobby/checking is very small

managementResponses.response: Brye, glad that you loved our room and thank you for your feedback on bathroom cleanliness. Our staff is generally very thorough when it comes to preparing the room for upcoming guests so it is strange that we looked over cleanliness of your bathroom. Please accept our apologies. We hope, you'll give us another try.

review.title: Nice hotel, good location!
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice and clean.  The staff was great upgraded me as soon as I got there.  Room was clean but the bathroom wasn't so great.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was great, the price great and the staff was great!
review.negativeRemarks: The cleanliness of the bathroom would be nice....
review.locationRemarks: Great location the Warf and restuarants.  Walk really any where....

managementResponses.response: So sorry that you were disappointed with your stay. The experiences you described here definitely falls short of standards we set for ourselves. Our staff is very thorough and maintains high quality standards in cleanliness and hospitality to ensure our guests have great, quality stay. It is strange that this has happened. If there is any other way we can make your future stays more pleasant, please don‚Äôt hesitate to let us know. Our goal is to make our guests as comfortable as possible and we‚Äôll look forward to having the opportunity to do just that.

review.title: Not very clean
review.reviewText: Bedding was dirty, floors were dirty, shower did not work, although covered parking was advertised it is very limited & had to park on street and pay for meter

managementResponses.response: So sorry that this happened. Please note that we looked into it to ensure this does not happen again. Once again, so sorry about this. We sincerely hope you'll give us another try.

review.reviewText: Heating system not working in the room, hotel staff said wait till 8 am in morning for maintenance guy to fix it. It was cold. Cramped parking lot.

managementResponses.response: Glad we could make your visit comfortable and pleasant. Hope to see you soon again!

review.title: Free parking and breakfast
review.reviewText: Parking is limited but we didn't have any issues getting a spot on the days we decided to drive around the city.

managementResponses.response: Hi there, thank you for staying with us during you recent trip to San Francisco. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We will look into your feedback about the power outlets. Thanks again, we look forward to welcome you back again next time you are in the area.

review.title: Clean motel close to Presidio and Marina
review.reviewText: Overall, the experience was good. It's quiet and the temoerature is perfect. The AC has digital thermostat. We slept very well each night. The wide cable selection is more than enough -- I was glad they had Tennis Channel. TV is digital.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, reliable free wireless service, helpful staff, free breakfast
review.negativeRemarks: There shiukd be two nightstands, not just one. There should be more power outlets to charge devices. I had to go to the bathroom to charge my iPhone.
review.locationRemarks: Location is great. There's a nearby fastfood restaurant (Pluto's) that sells delicious foods (salads, burgers, etc.) that are not expensive.

review.title: Good experience overall
review.reviewText: We had a good experience here. It had everything we wanted: close to major attractions, free parking, breakfast, comfy bed, and heater. Yes it is on a busy street, but it didn't bother us considering how tired we would be at the end of the day. Only complaint is that when we took a shower, the mist revealed some yellowing next to the toilet that most likely was urine! So I definitely recommend a better more thorough cleaning of hotel rooms.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, private bathroom, and comfy bed.
review.locationRemarks: Near the marina and its major attractions.
